title: Inventor
desc:
Post 2002
- As you play this, gain a copy of (1983) Stone Hammer
- While this is in your ID zone, whenever you don't have a Gadget, and you have at least three valid cards in your hand, three of the cards in your hand are selected at random. You must choose one of the three to transform into a new Gadget.
- The Gadget will be a random that naturally has at least one of the same colors as the original card. It must be used three times before it **Banishes** itself (or for three turns if it has a permanent effect like an <:enchantment:1107516323426213888> card), and is not **Phantom** or **Ethereal**, but it can be played with the same rules as a ⚡ card.
- <:holy:1120560132150022184>/<:rulebreaker:1120899966555127899>/<:ex:1118578840529281114>/🐸 cards can't be selected as Gadget choices.
